rules.description: Post escape when left_control is tapped and left_control when held
Double-tap and hold right_command to post command + option + control. Once released, returns to right_command
Use LaunchBar's Spotlight search when F4 is pressed on Apple's internal keyboard
Configure Logitech MX Mechanical Mini function keys (F7, F8, and F10)
Use left_control + pn to move cursor up/down in Craft
Use left_control + fbnpae to move cursor around in Microsoft Office
Map media control keys to function key in Microsoft Remote Desktop
